Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~jwagantall ~ry.jones I believe only linux foundation administrators can create new Jira projects... would you be able to create a Fabric CI (FABCI) project in Jira?

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: New project has been created for CI related tasks or bugs. https://jira.hyperledger.org/projects/FABCI
